image.altText: A generic graphic image including a gold dollar sign and some websites.

props.synopsis: Cybercriminals have stolen and shared almost 100 staff logins for Australia's Big Four banks, putting those businesses at a higher risk of mass data theft and ransomware attacks, cyber security researchers say.
